Question
========

A person achieves a score of 14.9 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 12.5 with a standard deviation 2.3. The z-score of the person with 14.9 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.04
* 1.39
* 1.68

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.04: Correct
* 1.39: Incorrect
* 1.68: Incorrect
